storyInfo: The gang fights the Rathalos once again, only to find their attacks remain just as ineffective. To protect the old hunter, Yato bears the brunt of its attack, while Noir Corne and the Felyne Scholar are taken to the sky by the Rathalos.

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato, are you alright?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's strange... These blades... They should be effective against the Rathalos, but I'm not getting anywhere with them.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Why? Am I not using them correctly?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Corne, cover me! I'll try again!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Got it! Ah, hold up! I don't have my shield! And what do I do with this blade—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Wait—You! Argh, whatever! I'm coming!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Scholar, do you have a plan yet?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Patience! I'm thinking! Don't rush meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The Rathalos's weakness... the Rathalos's attack patterns... That's not it... I remeowmber copying something about this from the Hunter's Notes. Where did I purrt them?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Are you sure you can handle this?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne, the Rathalos is coming your way! Watch out!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll just raise my—Where's my shield?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Dodge left, your meowjesty!
Long Swords require excellent control. You need to channel your inner energy to use them effectively. Victory is determined at the moment you unleash your attack.
That voice... It's the same one I heard earlier... Argh!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Er, what is this?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Stupid Noir Corne! That's a Felyne too. A Palico!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Horned foreign Hunter. I'm a Palico with years of experience... Mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Yato, it's going to breathe fire again!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: But look at that head, Scholar! Is that really a Felyne?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This armor was gifted to me by a Hunter whom I followed faithfully for years. It is the very embodiment of our countless hunts together, a symbol of bravery and experience... Mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm not getting any of that from it! And Scholar, why is there a Felyne fighting? I know you've been running away every time there's a fight!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You fool, that's a Palico! They're in charge of all the hunting!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Palicoes accompany Hunters on their hunts as partners. It is an age-old tradition. And not one limited to just Felynes. Supposedly, certain eastern villages train their Canynes to join in on their—
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: What are all of you doing?! Corne! Get it together!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I got it! Okay, lemme think. Control... Control...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Haaahhh! I got this! Take that!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It really worked!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Now's our chance!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Kashiwau! What are you doing? Why did you push me away?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This beast is mine to slay!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Out of my way! All of you!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yato, it's coming again!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Monster! Look over here!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Noir Corne, I have an idea!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: It's written in my notes that when using meowlee weapons, a Rathalos's head is its greatest weakness, followed by its wings and its tail!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The most important attack to watch for is its tailspin! It will sweep its tail to attack after confirming the position. So when you see it tilt its head, that's the direction it'll swing its tail!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: So we take advantage of the time it takes for its enormous body to readjust? Got it. Just like how Corne and I tried it the last time.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I cannot say for sure if it will work. There's been something abnormal about this Rathalos ever since it made its way here...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Regardless, it's worth a try. I'll strike.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll try to bait its tailspin then. Palico, you're more nimble than me. When it starts attacking, can you run interference?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I shall try my best... Mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Ah! Old man Kashiwau's rushing in again. Scholar, stop him!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: And meow am I supposed to do that?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Whatever, here goes! Hyah!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That's the sign that it's about to tailspin!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: (An opening...)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Now!)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wait, this doesn't feel right... Mrow!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The Rathalos noticed Yato's attack... How is that pawssible?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: It didn't even look...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Is that... Originium dust surrounding it?!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Watch out, Yato! It's about to breathe fire!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Phew... If I'd taken that head on, I'd probably be...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I've never heard of a Rathalos that could breathe terrifying flames like that!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I'm pawsitive there's nothing like that in my records...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Yato! It's charging your way again!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No, wait, it's not you it's after!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Only I have the right to face you!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yato! It's not charging! It's going to use its tailspin!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Out of the way!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Urghh—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You! I told you to stay out of my way! Why did you come for me?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Forget that! Worry about the Rathalos!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Meow! It's coming fur me!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Noir Corne! Help me! Mrowwww!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I-I'm coming!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm here too!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Mrow! I dodged it! I'm holding on! I'm fine! I'm okay!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Take this, you monster!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Scholar, let go!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I can't! If I do, I'll get eaten!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Just listen to me! I'll catch you!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mroaww! I couldn't catch him!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Alright! Got you, Scholar!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: My blade! Argh, what's going on?! It's stuck!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrow! You two...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Noir Corne! We—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Aaaahhh! Why are we in the air?!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, damn it! This fire!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Are you just going to stand and watch? Think of a way to strike it down!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Aho!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Without my Flash Bombs, I cant think of anything... mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: No, that's impossible. I can still—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Stop chasing it, your meowjesty! You won't make it!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We need to get somewhere safe right away! I still have a plan!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The campsite... It's burning...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: All the equipment's gone...
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: If my hunch is correct, the Rathalos must have retreated to a cave somewhere in this area... Mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: A cave?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Right. Ever since I arrived, I've been tracking the Rathalos and observing its actions. I've seen it enter a cave with my own eyes... Mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: My apologies... I've been trying to rid myself of this distracting habit, but purrhaps it's in my blood... I simply can't stop meowing... mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: But I digress. I can take the two of you there... mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: It's our only option. Please do.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And Kashiwau, if you want to fight the Rathalos again...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You have no choice but to come with us.
attributes.name: Yato
